data.tweet: Manchester City were aggressive out of possession, making four tackles in the final third, compared with one in their last game (against Wolves). United didn't attempt a single challenge in their attacking third. City also won 71% of the game's aerial duels.

data.tweet: City managed to play an impressive 15 successful balls into the opponent's box, while United completed six. City also played 17 successful balls into the final third, considerably less than their season average of 51 per 90 minutes.
